Literature.Title: Discovery of Novel Thanatin-like Antimicrobial Peptides from Bean Bug Riptortus pedestris
Literature.Author: Panteleev PV, Teplovodskaya JS, Utkina AD, Smolina AA, Kruglikov RN, Safronova VN, Bolosov IA, Korobova OV, Borzilov AI, Ovchinnikova TV

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=<0.06µM),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=0.125µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=<0.06µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.25µM),Enterobacter cloacae 4172(MIC=<0.06µM),Enterobacter cloacae 4172(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 2675(MIC=<0.06µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 2675(MIC=0.125µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=0.125µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>32µM),Proteus mirabilis(MIC=>32µM),Burkholderia cenocepacia(MIC=>32µM),Bacillus subtilis VKM B-886(MIC=1µM),Bacillus subtilis VKM B-886(MIC=>32µM),Bacillus licheniformis VKM B-511(MIC=2µM),Bacillus licheniformis VKM B-511(MIC=>32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>32µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=8µM)
